meanings.definition: Residents of a city or town who live in the northern or more affluent part.
meanings.sent1: The uptowners gathered for a community meeting in the upscale neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Many uptowners enjoy the amenities of the affluent part of the city.
meanings.sent3: The uptowners decided to have a fancy picnic in the northern part of town.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an uptowner when she visited the wealthy neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The uptowners' houses were grand and elegant, standing out from the rest of the city.

meanings.definition: A group of people who live in the upper part of a city or town.
meanings.sent1: The uptowners organized a charity event for the upper part of the city.
meanings.sent2: We often see uptowners shopping in the upper part of town.
meanings.sent3: The uptowners had a friendly competition to see who could climb the highest in the upper part of the city.
meanings.sent4: Their unity made them stand out like a group of uptowners in the upper part of town.
meanings.sent5: The uptowners enjoyed the view from the upper part of the city, feeling like they were on top of the world.

meanings.definition: People who reside in the more upscale or wealthy neighborhoods of a city.
meanings.sent1: The uptowners in the wealthy neighborhoods often host elegant parties.
meanings.sent2: Many uptowners prefer the upscale lifestyle of the city.
meanings.sent3: The uptowners joked that they were too fancy for the regular part of town.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an uptowner when she strolled through the wealthy neighborhoods.
meanings.sent5: The uptowners' luxurious cars lined the streets of the upscale neighborhoods, showcasing their wealth.
